description: This file defines the main component of a Tic Tac Toe game application using React. It manages the game state, including the squares on the board and the current player, and contains logic for determining the winner, handling clicks, and restarting the game.

methods.name: calculateWinner
methods.description: Calculates the winner of the Tic Tac Toe game based on the current squares on the board.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.description: Handles the logic for when a square is clicked during the game, updating the state accordingly.

methods.name: handleRestart
methods.description: Resets the game state, clearing the squares and setting the next player to X.
